text: Didsbury West is an area and electoral ward of Manchester, England. It is represented in Westminster by Jeff Smith MP for Manchester Withington. The 2011 Census recorded a population of 12,455. == Councillors == Three councillors serve the ward: File:John Leech canvassing in south Manchester.png|John Leech (Lib Dem) File:Blank.png| Richard
